txt.en: 'Many believe that the strength of the barghests lay in their howl. While it is true their howls are dangerous, the power of their eyes is equally dangerous. With but a gaze they have been known to strike a deep fear into their victims that can kill them.\n\n'I would ask you to seek out barghests and collect their eyes. I will pay you handsomely for this bounty.'
'These will do well. I am unclear what the power truly is behind these eyes, but I know that I have seen the ill that these creatures can bring about.\n\n'You have earned this reward well.'
'Barghests within the southern Barrow-downs are terribly dangerous. I will pay you well if you collect their eyes for me.'
Barghests can be found throughout the southern Barrow-downs. Their glowing eyes can be turned in for a bounty and crafting materials.
Deliver the barghest-eyes to Edith Sweetrose

Barghests can be found within the southern Barrow-downs,

Some barghests can chill a being with but a gaze. Edith Sweetrose, at Dead Man's Perch, has offered to provide you a reward for collecting barghest-eyes taken from the southern-dwelling barghests.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Bounty quests are repeatable quests, but have a finite number of completions. This quest can be completed three times.</rgb>
